product_name: FalconGuides Hiking Grand Teton National Park - 3rd Edition
long_description: The updated edition of. Author: Bill Schneider. Softcover; 188 pages; color photographs and maps. Morris Book Publishing, LLC; copyright 2012. Visit areas such as the Teton Crest Trail, Paintbrush Divide, Lake Solitude, Moose Creek Basin, Owl Creek and many others. Descriptions include distance, elevation gain, difficulty, mile-by-mile cues and GPS coordinates. Full color maps offer a handy reference as you hike. Author offers advice on planning your outings and safety tips. .
short_description: The updated edition of Hiking Grand Teton National Park guides you through varied trails in deep canyons and across the lofty ridges of Grand Teton's dramatic landscape.
